Uses of Package
alix.lucene.search

  • Packages that use alix.lucene.search 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
    alix.lucene.util
    Data structures used for indexing AND searching (ex: co-occurrences)
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.lucene 
    Class Description
    Facet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    Freqs  
    IntSeries
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some statistics.
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
    TermList
    An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice.
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.lucene.search 
    Class Description
    DicBytes.Cursor
    A private cursor in the list of terms, sorted by count.
    Freqs  
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
    Scorer
    Interface for a scorer, similar to tf-idf.
    TermList
    An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice.
    TopTerms
    An iterator for sorted list of terms
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.lucene.util 
    Class Description
    TermList
    An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice.
    TopTerms
    An iterator for sorted list of terms
